name: The Melting Snowman
description:
A, D - movement

Space - jump

The Melting Sowman is a platformer in which you have to move everything around to find  your mom, if you aren't standing under cloud you will melt and you will have to start level again, if you want to adjust volume or change graphics quality go to settings

it's first game jam I am participating in so sorry if there are some bugs
